dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4762 RH: To amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the non-premium war risk insurance program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Yakym (for himself and Mrs. Sykes) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
Reported from the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the non-premium war risk insurance program.

section.header: Non-premium war risk insurance program extension
section.text: Section 44310(b) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2025.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
